metadata.synopsis: If Lae'zel or GITH avatar is present they react to interacting with the map in the Captain's office. If they aren't present, some other party character reacts with generic comment.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Load up CRE_Main_AGo to 1392; -2; -772interact with the parchment on the wall

0.speaker: Player
0.text: A map of the Sword Coast? What are the gith planning?
